title: Lag Spikes after latest patch
body: I have really good internet (100mbps download/upload) yet in this latest patch i've been noticing some spikes. Some other people ive played with aswell have had these spikes. Comment if you've had some aswell.

replies.body: same riot fix this my ping is 78-90ms it's good but i'm lagging even though my ping is 78-90ms since this patch
